description:
Lonewolfie's Driver SF Props, turned into Photon components.

Thanks to ForceGhost for the icon.

IDs:
"Internet Driver SF Pushbar" -> Red/Blue Bullbar.
"Internet Driver SF Lightbar Red/Blue" -> Red/Blue Lightbar.
"Internet Driver SF Lightbar Blue" -> Blue Lightbar.
"Internet Driver SF Lightbar Amber/White" -> Amber/White Lightbar.

No, these aren't vehicles, they're components. You turn them into vehicles. No, they won't work without Photon.
title: [Photon] Driver SF Police Package
